ack.p: The authors would like to thank all members of the COMPASS study team for the valuable contribution in setting up the study. The COMPASS study team consists of members from Geneva University Hospitals and from the Ente Ospedaliero Cantonale, Carlo Balmelli, Nicolò Centemero, Valentina Coray, Serge Da Silva, Emmanuel Durand, Christophe Marti, Lorenzo Moja, Francesco Pagnamenta, Marie-Françoise Piuz, Javier Portela, Virginie Prendki, Jerôme Stirnemann, Nathalie Vernaz.
